Salsa Picante Chocolate Habanero

Smoky chocolate habaneros balanced with pineapple and cacao nibs for a layered heat.

$14 5 oz bottle Hot Sauces Heat: 4/5

About this product

Our flagship sauce infuses locally grown chocolate habaneros with roasted cacao nibs, pineapple, and panela. Expect a deep, molasses-like heat that mellows into tropical brightness. It’s brilliant on roasted vegetables, rice bowls, or drizzled over ceviche.

Ingredients

  • Chocolate habanero chiles
  • Roasted cacao nibs
  • Pineapple
  • Apple cider vinegar
  • Panela (unrefined cane sugar)
  • Sea salt
  • Garlic
  • Cacao husk-infused water

Dietary Notes

  • vegan
  • gluten-free

Functional Highlights

  • anti-inflammatory
  • metabolism-support

Crafted in Florida & Costa Rica with love for the hummingbird and the people we serve.
